name: Confines of the Law
description:
Well partner, you done it. You finally became sheriff!

With your first day on the trail there's nothin' left to do but pour yourself a drink, close the cell door where ELLIOT HALIFAX should be locked up, and then -

JUST WAIT NOW. What was that? ELLIOT HALIFAX ain't in his cell? You best be gettin' after him! That sun's starting to set, and if he sets foot over that border, he'll be out of your jurisdiction.

Saddle up, friend! A sheriff's job is never over!
